comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Colonial repatriates in the village of Ataka near the Gulf of Suez, after their time in the Japanse camps. The Dutch government had installed a depot in Ataka with mainly winterclothes for the poor repatriates.
Egypt, Ataka, 1946
